title: kaDavuLaik-kANuminE
sahitya:
kaDavuLaik-kAnuminE kaNNAravE karuNaiyaip-pUNuminE


anupallavi

  dhiDam koNDa malaiyilE naTamiDu nadiyilE tirai kaDal veLLattil teLinda nal uLLattil


caraNam    ezhil perum iyarkkaiyil tozhil puriyum kaiyil ilandiruk-kAdalar uLamagizh anbinil
sezhivayal viLaivilE pozhiyum vAn vaLaivilE shen-kadir matiyilE sirittu viLaiyADum
